content.rendered:
Table of Contents

  • Missions List
    • Pre-Pokémon League Missions
    • Post-Pokémon League Missions
  • Mission Rewards

There are 84 missions total in Pokémon Unbound, and 27 of them are not available until you enter the post-game by defeating the Pokémon League.

In addition, if you defeat Aklove in the Depths of the Ruins of Void in the post-game and get to the second credits sequence, the Missions Screen will show the location of any missions you have yet to complete.

Missions List

Missions are numbered alphabetically, so in the following tables they have been separated into Pre-Pokémon League and Post-Pokémon League Missions for ease of searching.

Pre-Pokémon League Missions

Mission Location Description Reward Picture
#001: A Hero’s Journey Frozen Heights
Professor Log’s Lab 		Requirements: None

Complete the main story mission of the game, including defeating the Light of Ruin and becoming Pokémon Champion. 		Access to the Post-Game
#002: A Life of No Regrets Dehara City
Game Corner 		Requirements: None

Play Cloud Burst in the Game Corner and collect 3000 Coins in a single day 		Pokémon
Balloon Pikachu

Black Emboar Headquarters 		Requirements: #061: The Black Emboar and #073: The Terror Granbull

Mission HQ 		Requirements: None

Mission Rewards

The Mission HQ in Fallshore City is the source of a lot of these quests, and you can get various rewards from the Pokémon Ranger in the lobby after defeating a number of them:

# of Completed Missions Reward Image
20 Completed Missions Type: Null
Normal
45 Completed Missions Latios
Dragon/Psychic
(chance to catch)
60 Completed Missions Shiny Charm
